events.name: TemperatureAlertTriggered
events.description: To notify when the temperature exceeds predefined thresholds.

events.name: HumidityAlertTriggered
events.description: To notify when humidity levels are outside acceptable ranges.

events.name: ColdChainAnomalyDetected
events.description: To log any anomalies detected during cold chain monitoring.

events.name: ColdChainMonitoringFailed
events.description: To indicate failure in cold chain monitoring process.

commands.name: TriggerTemperatureAlert
commands.description: To notify when the temperature exceeds predefined thresholds.

commands.name: TriggerHumidityAlert
commands.description: To notify when humidity levels are outside acceptable ranges.

commands.name: ReportColdChainAnomaly
commands.description: To log any anomalies detected during cold chain monitoring.

commands.name: ReportColdChainMonitoringFailure
commands.description: To indicate failure in cold chain monitoring process.

integrationPoints.name: MonitoringDashboard
integrationPoints.description: To provide visual representation of alerts and anomalies.

integrationPoints.name: ComplianceReporting
integrationPoints.description: To ensure compliance documentation is updated with cold chain incidents.
